list.title: buildComponent
list.description: This function returns a modified version of the template by replacing specific placeholders with corresponding values from the object. Inside the loop, the template is modified using the replace method. It searches for a placeholder pattern {{atom_data:key}} in the template and replaces it with the corresponding value from the object. After iterating over all key-value pairs, the template may still contain unresolved placeholders that weren't found in the object. To remove these placeholders, another replace method is used with the regex /{{atom_data:[^}]+}}/g. The placeholders are replaced with an empty string, effectively removing them from the template.

list.title: componentOrchestrator~organismSource
list.description: organismSource and moleculeSource are the paths to the file template to build the component. organism must be the main content of the component otherwise the molecule must be the repeated part of the component. always think in a table: the organism is the table in group with table headers, table footers... while the molecule is a simple table row. -- in case of the molecule component doesn't provide any data and it's just the template, in the component's service file return something like this: return [''];

list.title: event:awaitComponentLoad
list.description: This mutation observer is required by functions that need await the component orchestrator finish the proccess of building the component instance. by default, it stop when the first molecule is appended.

list.title: importComponent
list.description: This function returns a component from CDN Provider.

list.title: module:C903~C903.hasSignaturePending
list.description: Checks if a document has a signature pending;

list.title: module:C903~C903.hasUngeneratedDocs
list.description: Checks if documents are not yet generated
